roles.title: UX Engineer
highlights: Prototyped navigation models, on-screen keyboards, customization features, and other system components for project GEM, a candybar shaped mobile device
Developed various high-fidelity sample applications for GEM

roles.title: Frontend Software Engineer
highlights: Maintained and updated primary company website with internationalized content, promotional forms, and new pages; deployed to Heroku with a SecureCDN cache to serve thousands of daily active users
Engineered custom features like bundled add-ons for Shopify online store
Coded and helped design theme for Zendesk support website
Supported marketing team by coding several Mailchimp email templates
